definition: hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.english: It is the ancestor of karate and ju-jitsu.
sentences.chinese: 功夫起源于中国，是空手道和柔术的祖先。

sentences.english: The black belt is the highest level in karate.
sentences.chinese: 黑腰带级是空手道的最高级别。

sentences.english: I have competed in bodybuilding and karate.
sentences.chinese: 我参加锻炼身体和空手道的比赛了。

sentences.english: At the time I was a black belt in my martial art (kenpo).
sentences.chinese: 在那时，我本身已经是一个空手道黑带。

sentences.english: He holds a black belt in karate.
sentences.chinese: 他是空手道黑带级选手。

sentences.english: Think karate kid , now take away the karate.
sentences.chinese: 我每隔两天去运动中心练空手道。

sentences.english: I wish my dad would teach me karate.
sentences.chinese: 我希望父亲能教我空手道。

sentences.english: Listen, fellow, I'm a black-belt in karate, so don't try to get fresh with me.
sentences.chinese: 听着，家伙，我是空手道黑带，所以别想对我轻浮。

sentences.english: This class also has competitions and "tests".
sentences.chinese: 这种空手道班充满着竞争和“考验”。

sentences.english: My son's mother has had him in karate classes now for about 6 months.
sentences.chinese: 孩子的母亲让孩子参加空手道班已经有六个月了。

sentences.english: You karate and judo girls dan't stand a chance with an old-fash-Toned wrestler like me.
sentences.chinese: 你们的空手道和柔道赢不了我这老式摔跤手。

sentences.english: He did achieve a lot in karate.
sentences.chinese: 在空手道上，泰勒取得了一定的成绩。

sentences.english: I jump into a karate pose in front of everyone.
sentences.chinese: 我在众人面前跳了起来并摆出了个空手道的姿势。

sentences.english: The life of Kyokushin Karate is Kumite(fighting). The life of Kumite, fighting, is in basics.
sentences.chinese: 极真空手道的真谛在于对打，这是最基础的。

sentences.english: They must be of approved WKF design.
sentences.chinese: 垫子必须是世界空手道联盟核准的设计。

sentences.english: Alice's boyfriend knew a little karate.
sentences.chinese: 艾丽斯的男朋友懂一点儿空手道。

definition: Jeet Kun Do or Way of the Intercepting Fist, a fusion of Eastern and Western martial arts led by Bruce Lee 李小龍|李小龙[Li3 Xiao3 long2]

military skill or technique (in former times)/all kinds of martial art sports (some claiming spiritual development)/self-defense/tradition of choreographed fights from opera and film (recent usage)/also called kungfu 功夫/CL:種|种[zhong3]
Wing Chun/same as 詠春拳|咏春拳[yong3 chun1 quan2]/Yongchun - "Singing Spring Fist" (Chinese martial art)
Ba Ji Quan "Eight Extremes Fist" - Martial Art
to fight, esp. with hands/wrestling (as a sport)/to wrestle/to wrestle (against fate, with a problem etc)/to capture prey
